root: ^“Hey Mayor, I was doing some experimenting with some metals and found a good alloy we could use in the village. What do you say?”

c-0: ^“Thank you so much, Mayor! You have no idea how great this will be for the town!”
c-1: ^“Mayor, I told you my idea was good! Now we’re just going to do the same thing but waste more money in the process.”
c-2: ^“Mayor, the alloys are still working as normal so don’t worry. No new alloys but the old ones were my old man’s so I’m still happy to use them.”
